column5: hey guys, ok i just recieved my abu garcia 4600c3 reel, im looking to pair it up with a rod, i fish bass and pike, also im gonna return the fenwicks and im looking at the clarus rods, 69$ range, the reels that need pairs are sedona 100, shimano castaic, and the abu, any help much appreciated
look for a 7' medium heavy for the 4600c3.   Pretty sure there is Clarus in those specs.

Hey urbanangler you should take a spin towards LeBarons they got some good deals on last years Med-Hev Quantum pt rods and Med-hev Berkleys Xseries rods, browse around while you are there i seen some other specials on rods.
I agree with Raf, I've got a 7' medium heavy Clarus. If you're fishing in the slop try a 7'6" flipping stick. It's got lots of backbone, and it could double up as a pike and musky rod.
